subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Pascal Dupuis had a short-handed goal and an assist, James Neal scored for the sixth time this season and the depleted Pittsburgh Penguins won at Minnesota, 4-2, on Tuesday night.
snippet: Pascal Dupuis had a short-handed goal and an assist, James Neal scored for the sixth time this season and the depleted Pittsburgh Penguins won at Minnesota, 4-2, on Tuesday night.
